original_text: Jesus saw her and he called her to come to him. He said, ‘Woman, you are now better from your illness.’
korean_text: 예수께서 보시고 불러 이르시되 여자여 네가 네 병에서 놓였다 하시고

sentences.original_text: and he called her to come to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그녀에게 자기에게 오라고 불렀다

sentences.original_text: 'Woman, you are now better from your illness.'
